changes.description: Added optional tier filtering with tier lookup and first-list default selection improvements
Added previous/next character navigation for faster roster browsing
Added paste-JSON import modal and improved tier sorting workflow
Added fullscreen preview with navigation controls and thumbnail strip
Added Konami code easter egg modal
Improved sidebar behavior by keeping nav groups expanded and expanding on click
Added expand/collapse support for recommended character sections
Centralized gear icon mapping and added GearTypeTag support
Improved bulk redeem actions to respect active filters and normalized active status handling
Added Open Graph metadata and switched to public banner/logo assets
Stabilized key usage and recent-updates ordering to reduce render churn
Refined drag-and-drop tier placement logic and related list interactions
Improved sync robustness with local-branch fallback when origin checkout fails
Refreshed live datasets (factions, artifacts, hashes, timestamps, and additional content uploads)
Refined suggestion workflow permissions, concurrency isolation, and queue handling
Refactored Star Upgrade Calculator UI and logic for improved layout and usability
Updated favicon image
Reorganized components into character/, common/, layout/, and tools/ subdirectories for cleaner project structure
Improved Dolt sync error handling and recovery with better failure messaging
Removed deprecated Dolt sync/export tooling and CI sync job
Added Team Synergy Assistant with synergy score computation and recommendations
Added team compare workflow in Team Builder for side-by-side composition review
Added reusable pagination controls across list and detail-heavy pages, including changelog
Added shared SearchData context and improved global search/error handling integration
Improved select usability by enabling search only when option sets are large
Refined teams page layout by moving the Edit action and reordering team badges
Added class icon labels to team synergy and comparison badges for faster role scanning
Updated team comparison portraits to circular avatars for improved visual consistency
Normalized content types for teams and tier lists across backend models and frontend UI
Preserved faction IDs during sync/export and added deterministic key sorting
Added Dolt branch selection support for main/dev workflows and --pull option in sync tool
Refreshed live datasets (artifacts, noble phantasms, gear, codes, tier lists, factions, and characters)
Initial public release of Dragon Traveler Wiki
Added responsive sidebar navigation and section-based route organization
Added global search modal with fuzzy search and keyboard shortcuts
Added artifacts database with detail pages
Added character database with portraits and skill information
Added gear database with detail pages
Added howlkins database, filters, and golden alliance reference
Added noble phantasms database with detail pages
Added resources database with category and quality filtering
Added subclasses database with class-linked tiers, bonuses, and effects
Added status effects database with icons and descriptions
Added wyrmspells database
Added tier list page with reference selection and builder tooling
Added teams list and team detail pages
Added redemption codes tracker with active/inactive status
Added useful links page for community tools and resources
Added guide pages: Beginner Q&A, Star Upgrade Calculator, and Shovel Event Guide
Added changelog page and structured release history data
Added dark/light theme toggle, shared page transitions, and loading/empty/error states
Added suggestion modals across core pages for community-driven data updates
